owner_response.text:
Bapak/ Ibu d41d1 yang terhormat, 
Terimakasih telah menyediakan waktu anda untuk memberi ulasan tentang pengalaman tinggal di Novotel Karawang melalui  Tripadvisor. 
Kami menyesal bahwa pengalaman tinggal kali ini tidak sesuai dengan harapan anda dan kami dengan tulus mohon maaf atas ketidak nyamanan tersebut. Sehubungan dengan masukan anda, setiap departemen terkait telah melakukan hal-hal yang diperlukan agar hal serupa tidak terjadi lagi kedepannya. 
Bookingan anda dilakukan melalui online travel agent dan merupakan non-refundable booking, dimana pembayaran dilakukan melalui pihak ketiga dan dana tidak dapat dikembalikan. Sebagai bentuk itikad baik, tim kami berupaya untuk memberikan solusi, seperti menawarkan upgrade tipe kamar dari tipe superior ke tipe deluxe untuk pengalaman tinggal yang lebih baik dan pada akhirnya melakukan refund yang seharusnya memang benar tidak dapat dilakukan. Namun kami memahami jika hal tersebut belum sesuai dengan harapan anda. 
Disisi lain, kami menyesalkan bahwa anda telah mengambil dokumentasi proses perbaikan internal tanpa persetujuan. 
Namun kepuasan tamu sangat penting bagi kami, karenanya masukan anda kami terima dengan positif dan kami gunakan sebagai alat untuk selalu meningkatkan mutu pelayanan.

text: Saya 2x nginep disini, di kamar superior dan deluxe. Lobby luas dan terlihat mewah. Untuk deluxe kamar lebih luas dan ada lemari pakaiannya, tapi secara view saya lebih senang yang superior karena jendela lebih besar. Waktu itu saya dikasih kamar deluxe, posisi pojok, jendela kamarnya juga kok ukurannya nanggung ya dipojokan. Memang yang deluxe di kamar mandi ada jendela juga, tapi ya buat apa juga sih kalo menurut saya, toh pasti ditutup juga kan hehe. Furniture, kebersihan kamar bagus, channel TV cukup tapi kualitas gambar agak jelek/bintik2. Sarapan pada saat okupansi tinggi, bervariasi dan enak2. Kali ke dua variasinya kurang, mungkin karena tamu lebih sedikit?? Ada swimming pool dan tempat fitness, bisa buat olahraga tapi alatnya ga banyak, kalo lagi banyak tamu yang pakai harus nunggu gantian.. Tempat parkir cukup memadai ada basementnya juga. Secara lokasi dekat ke kawasan industri, ke pusat kota juga dekat sih karena karawang kotanya ga terlalu besar. Ac nya sentral, tapi terlalu dingin menurut saya. Staffnya secara umum cukup responsif mungkin karena ini hotel jaringan accor jadi training karyawannya sudah baik. Namun bila lebih ramah akan lebih bagus lagi 👍
title: One good hotel di karawang

text:
International Chain hotel yang berada di lokasi sangat strategis yaitu di gerbang masuk kota krawang dan sangat dekat dengan gerbang tol krawang. Fasad bangunan sangat menarik. Parking area yang luas di basement. Resepsionis sangat profesional dan membantu tanpa ada kesan meremehkan tamu. Segenap staff hotel sangat ramah. Check in dan check out sangat efisien dan cepat. Utk naik elevator menuju lantai kamar diperlukan acces card hal ini menunjukkan kesan privasi dan keamanan. Ruang kamar ukuran pas cukup lega utk 2 orang.memiliki jendela ceiling to floor. Dari jendela mendapatkan best view persawahan luas yang menunjukan krawang sebagai lumbung padi jawa barat. Ada sofa dan bed yang sangat nyaman. Ac sentral yang cukup dingin dan dapat berfungsi juga sebagai exhaust. Kamar mandi menggunakan rain shower dengan semburan air yang sangat kencang. Amenities lengkap, ada hair dryer, setrika, dan senter. Nuansa kamar jepang elegan minimalis yang membuat betah berada di dalam kamar. Harga sangat bersaing bahkan dibanding hotel bintang 3. 
Sangat direkomendasikan menginap disini. Untuk area krawang, cikampek, pamanukan, dan purwakarta novotel krawang adalah yang terbaik.

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Stayed here as platinum member.

I paid IDR290K before tax for the standard room i booked and they upgraded to a beatiful deluxe corner room. And the room was absolutely beautiful with incredibly comfortable bedding, really hard to believe for the price.

A bottle of aqua reflection (premium mineral water glass bottle) with nicely decorated cake with chocolate writing in sundanese "wilujeng sumping" means welcome, were already in my room prior to my arrival with the room already switch on not using but name card of the GM instead (nice touch), which i think also manages the mewly opened mercure tangerang city center if i read it correctly.

Shower was great with good water pressure, rain shower was also available. View from bathroom was also great. Breakfast were awesome i really love the porridge and bread butter pudding there were my personal favorite.

And i can redeed my welcome drink vouchers (member benefits) for every drinks on their menu (some others also do this, but not with price under IDR 300k lol). Definitely put some other mercure and novotel offering nothing but tea and cofee to shame.

If i value what i got besides the room i booked, my bookings basically have paid itself:

2x welcome drinks @50k / 100k
2x breakfast per pax @100k /200k
1x welcome ammenities @50k / 50k

And thats not counting the free parking, the gym, the pool and many other accesible facilities, not to mention the acces to this hotel from toll exit is incredibly easy. Maybe the hotel suffers a loss from my stay lol never know

Definitely one of the best novotel i ever come accross, much better than most 400k - 600k novotel indonesia, even on par with some of the best novotel including novotel bogor raya which i also really loved. And at under IDR 300k this hotel is NO BRAINER.

And definitely still a no brainer even at IDR 500k lol

Best of the best for novotel. 11 out of 5. All the staffs should be extremely proud.

Notes: I have read all the non 5 star review of this hotel on trip advisor and none of them related to core hospitality so i think everyone can agrees that this hotel is beyond awesome :)
title: Represent the Best of Accor and Novotel

text:
I stayed here for family holiday.
As Accorplus Platinum member I got upgraded to 1 level up which is Ok. when arrived the check-in process was Ok, But sad spa was closed during my stay. The hotel location is actually far from commercial area (mall, market, food, etc.)

However the weird thing happened when I came back for dinner from outside and would like to find a parking lot. that day I found 1 parking lot available but a security put a parking cone, and he says that someone had already reserved because they wanted to go for dinner and go back to park there. That moment the parking lot is almost full.

I'm not sure if that is the hotel rule, only the staff can explain right??
I then came to reception staff and asked why got parking lot is reserved by someone as per my understanding that is free for any guest to park, the funny thing happened where reception staff (Indah) told me that is General Manager's car but then she looked at her colleague (Mahmud) and asking him for confirmation, but Mahmud was also really confused and told back to her maybe owner's car, then Indah says again General Manager's car certainly. Both were playing a scenario that showed face in childish manner.
Mahmud then suddenly went out and got close to security and told him something, maybe another scenario they were setting up again.
The next day I noted a car parked there was T 1129 DS (probably this is General Manager's car right).

That moment the parking lot was almost full, I'm just wanna say if that was really OWNER/GM's car then it's Ok Fine,
but if that was guest's car then it was really disappointing action played by the hotel's staff.
Or maybe lack of customer handling complaint skills?
title: Disappointing parking lot issue

text:
Since 22 years i am for business in Indonesia and never had a more lousy service.  Starting with arrival and no concierge working there.  After unload my luggage needed to wait 20 minutes for check inn. After check in i was informed that breakfast could not be given in restaurant due to covid and will ne served in room. Which i finally done as no other choice. Very poor selection and also additional pastry to the ordered American breakfast was denied.  I ordered the breakfast for 7 am and 7.20 it was still not served.  After complaining it was served aeound 7.25 but cold and was looking as 
 is not even sealed and not known how old it is. Reason environmental protection.  But this easily could be done using a glass bottle and put a seal from hotel with sticker or something like this. Anyway after work I decided to go to the restaurant,  here a nice smoking area available,  and ordrer food. Even I not understand why the restaurant serves dinner when no breakfast could be served due to Corona. Maybe evening no spreading possible. The portions was very small but also the price moderate.  Back to the room, no air-conditioning in the corridor and like a sauna.... inside the room the electricity and air-conditioning is switched off when no key card is inserted and i only got one. But also the electricity for charging devices is switched off which is very poor and I was not expecting as usually the socket at working desc is always powered. Inside the hotel there are "x" marked for social distancing but here and my colleague not understood how this should work as not made any sense and understandable like in other hotels.  Maybe I am not clever enough but in the other 15 hotels I visited during my trip I understood. Never ever one night there anymore and o wanted to try as it looks newer as otherwise always in Mercure which is the much better choice.
title: Downgrade all services with the excuse of Corona
